comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Not sure if you are trolling, Bitcoin SV is pushed by serial scammers Craig Wright & Calvin Ayre. I’m not sure if you’re aware that CW is the guy who fraudulently claims to be Satoshi Nakamoto. BSV is a major shitcoin & I wouldn’t go anywhere near it for a single cent of investment.

comments.body: Edited a part, to avoid idiots believing it.A cash cow that never dies, so now you can understand the potential, I just want to get to know them better, like if there is a rich list of addresses, etc.
